text: Every day,

new technology is empowering businesses
of all sizes

to expand their reach, gain
more customers and grow.

But growth requires that businesses
avoid unintended disruptions

that can derail momentum,
making security critical.

For many small and medium
sized businesses,

building a security infrastructure that
enables long term growth is a challenge

because lack of in-house expertise,
limited budgets and time

spent on costly hardware maintenance,
and manual security tasks get in the way.

A cloud based security solution
allows businesses of all sizes
to scale with visibility and control

without exhausting
the resources needed to manage security.

That's because cloud based security
solutions

can streamline threat
detection, help guard against incidents,

and even help support compliance.
With Amazon Web services,

businesses of any size can efficiently
and affordably

implement, operationalize and scale
with the highest level of security.

Our security services empower
your business to run sensitive workloads

while helping you to fulfill your security
risk and compliance requirements
allowing your employees to spend less time

managing incidents and more time
growing your business.

In fact,
our customers report on average 43.4%
fewer monthly security incidents and a 69%
reduction in unplanned downtime.
AWS can help you secure your business

no matter where you are on your cloud
journey,

and it can even help train teams
to address security incidents,

giving them the tools to prevent, detect
and respond quickly,

to reduce risk and continue
to grow with fewer disruptions.
Visit aws.amazon.com/smart-business
to learn more.
